RelatedSentence: BJP leader Sushma Swaraj , who is reportedly not on best of terms with Prime Minister - elect Narendra Modi , held a meeting with the Gujarat chief minister Monday .
The meeting took place at Gujarat Bhawan , where Modi has been camping since Sunday , sources said .
